sessionDialog.headline: Session expired
sessionDialog.text: It seems your session is expired. Do you want log in again?

partner.title: Partner
partner.requestReceivedSubtitle: {alias} wants to create a connection with you.

receivedPresentations.title: Received Presentations
receivedPresentations.text: The presentations you received from your partner

sentPresentations.title: Sent Presentations
sentPresentations.text: The presentations you sent to your partner

issuedCredentials.title: Issued Credentials
issuedCredentials.text: The credentials you issued to your partner

presentationRequests.title: Presentation Requests
presentationRequests.text: The proofs requested from this partner

stateDialog.title: Connection State {state}
stateDialog.text: The connection with your Business Partner is marked as {state}. This could mean that your request will fail. Do you want to try anyways?
